Emote.label: Emotes
Emote.tooltip: Space seperated list of emote codes (case sensitive)

EmoteUse.label: Use Emote Filter
EmoteUse.tooltip: If checked, messages without these emotes are not added to the queue

Keyword.label: Keywords
Keyword.tooltip: Space seperated list of keywords (ignores case)

KeywordUse.label: Use Keyword Filter
KeywordUse.tooltip: If checked, messages without these keywords are not added to the queue

PauseScroll.label: Scroll pause time (sec)
PauseScroll.tooltip: Time in seconds autoscrolling is paused when scrolling manually

PauseScrollUse.label: Pause autoscroll when scrolled manually
PauseScrollUse.tooltip: Pause autoscroll for configured time when you scroll manually in the queue.

btnOpen.label: Open Queue
btnOpen.tooltip: Queue must be opened to recieve entries

info.label: Info
info.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

permission.label: Permission
permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command
